DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate whether PF-02545920 safe effective treatment sub-optimally control symptom schizophrenia 12-week outpatient treatment period . The study use Positive Negative Syndrome Scale ( PANSS ) measure change symptoms PF-02545920 baseline compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: An Outpatient Study Of The Efficacy , Safety , And Tolerability Of PF-02545920 In The Adjunctive Treatment Of Sub-Optimally Controlled Symptoms Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Psychiatrically stable subject schizophrenia suboptimal response current treatment Evidence stable schizophrenia symptomatology great equal 3 month . Subjects must stable medication treatment regimen great equal 2 month , include concomitant psychotropic medication . History seizures condition risk seizure . Subjects schizophrenia respond current treatment . Pregnant nursing female , female child bear potential .
